abstract.p: Harry Bosco, retired Lucent Technologies president, joins Clarity Partners as special venture partner (S)

block.p: Harry Bosco, a 35-year veteran of Lucent Technologies, has joined Clarity Partners, a Los Angeles-based venture capital firm that specializes in media and communications.

Mr. Bosco, 55, retired two months ago as president of Lucent's optical networking business and said he would work with entrepreneurs to develop companies in the telecommunications networking industry.
Harry Bosco, a 35-year veteran of Lucent Technologies, has joined Clarity Partners, a Los Angeles-based venture capital firm that specializes in media and communications.

Mr. Bosco, 55, retired two months ago as president of Lucent's optical networking business and said he would work with entrepreneurs to develop companies in the telecommunications networking industry.

Two years ago, Mr. Bosco met David Lee, now a partner at Clarity, when Mr. Lee was an executive at Global Crossing, the undersea cable operator with offices in Beverly Hills. That two-year friendship, Mr. Bosco said, turned into an offer from Clarity to join as a special venture partner. Mr. Bosco will have offices in Los Angeles, New Jersey and Florida.
